summary: When a crown prince visits, the princess's mother tries to push the prince into marrying her daughter by presenting a "rival" at the ball - her children's handsome tutor.
cast: Grace Kelly|Alec Guinness|Louis Jourdan|Agnes Moorehead|Jessie Royce Landis|Brian Aherne|Leo G. title: El cisne
